definition: thick soft fur lying beneath the longer and coarser guard hair, cover with a primer
details:
noun
- thick soft fur lying beneath the longer and coarser guard hair
= synonyms: underfur
- the first or preliminary coat of paint or size applied to a surface
= synonyms: priming
- seal consisting of a coating of a tar or rubberlike material on the underside of a motor vehicle to retard corrosion
= synonyms: underseal
verb
- cover with a primer
= synonyms: prime, ground
